title: Intelligent Automation for FinEdge
description: How we built a scalable, AI-powered platform to automate risk analysis and data processing, improving efficiency by 40%.
challenge: FinEdge faced challenges with manual data handling and slow risk assessment workflows, leading to delayed investment insights and operational inefficiency.
solution: We developed a fully automated, AI-driven risk analysis engine using Python and FastAPI, integrated with a real-time dashboard built in Next.js. The solution streamlined data ingestion, analysis, and reporting.
results: Enabled real-time decision-making for investment analysts

title: AI-Powered E-commerce for RetailCo
description: Developed a full-stack web app with a personalized recommendation engine, increasing user engagement and conversion rates.
challenge: RetailCo needed an intelligent e-commerce platform capable of recommending products based on customer behavior and purchase patterns.
solution: We built a modern full-stack web app using Next.js and Node.js, powered by an AI-based recommendation engine that personalizes user journeys in real time.
results: Enhanced customer engagement through personalized suggestions
Seamless checkout and optimized mobile performance

title: Telehealth SaaS Platform
description: Designed and built a multi-tenant SaaS platform for telehealth providers, ensuring HIPAA compliance and a seamless user experience.
challenge: HealthConnect needed a scalable SaaS platform to enable remote consultations, appointment scheduling, and secure data management for multiple clinics.
solution: We created a HIPAA-compliant, cloud-based telehealth platform with real-time video calling, role-based access control, and analytics dashboards for clinicians and administrators.
results: Enabled multi-clinic scalability within one platform
Ensured 100% compliance with HIPAA and GDPR standards
